snippet: “The Price of Gold,” part of ESPN’s documentary series “30 for 30,” chronicles the figure-skating rivalry between Tonya Harding and Nancy Kerrigan.
abstract: Mike Hale notes that Nanette Burstein documentary The Price of Gold, which is is about 1994 rivalry between Olympic figure skaters Nancy Kerrigan and Tonya Harding, premieres on ESPN same night as several tabloid-style reality shows on other networks; maintains that story of Kerrigan and Harding paved way for current popularity of class-conscious reality television.
lead_paragraph: “The Price of Gold,” part of ESPN’s documentary series “30 for 30,” chronicles the figure-skating rivalry between Tonya Harding and Nancy Kerrigan.

headline.print_headline: Twenty Years On, an Icy Rivalry Still Has Heat
headline.seo: ‘The Price of Gold’ Revisits the Harding-Kerrigan Story
headline.main: Twenty Years On, an Icy Rivalry Still Has Heat
